title: Tree of Sorrow
description: The second book of the Fires Trilogy: The Three Sisters have returned to the east to re-conquer what they have lost.Queen Fenarius leads a mixed army to defend against the Three Sisters. They are no match against Terror, Pain, and Death who use many evil forces against them. Their greatest monster is sent out to destroy Ka, a threat to their plans.As the Blentiun army fights for their lives at Tyrines, Ka is throttled with immense pain from the Pendle. She seeks the Firths to remove the device. Swamped with believers, she runs from the spiritual icon that has been created of her and selfishly looks for a way to remove a magical device that may be able to save the east.She now must make a choice to follow her destiny or abandon the races.Contains action/violence but no language. Good for young adult reading. Extras are a map, dictionary and 1 short story.
author: Eric John Ladwig
